conbody.p: The INFORM procedures prescribed in this section provide a standardized approach to GSA’s post-award communications with offerors and provide all offerors fair access to data, i.e., successful and unsuccessful offerors with detailed information about their submissions. GSA’s INFORM procedures are designed to strengthen the relationship between GSA and industry by providing:

li.p: (b) Useful feedback which can assist industry with future submissions; and
(c) Sufficient information on why the offeror did or did not receive the award.
